page.title: 13EVENTS
page.content: {Traction engine rally.}One weekend in August there is a traction engine rally at Astle Park(West of the A535 road South of the Church).There is a fun fair and an exhibition of engines. There is also a tug of war game between the traction engines. {May Carnival.}This takes place on the Bank Holiday Monday at the end of May.The May Queen is crowned (1985 - Dawn Boyling ) and there is a procession which has a band and floats including our school float. There are other activities,e.g.a fun run, during the rest of the week.{ {Bonfire Night.}Every year there is a community bonfire.You pay to watch it and the funds go to charity. {School Sports day.}Every year there is a school sports day in the afternoon or evening so parents can watch.
